overall-enabled.label: Mod Enabled?
overall-enabled.tooltip: Enable/disable entire mod, can be used to return to vanilla functionality in case of an issue.
general-store-wed.label: General Store on Wed?
general-store-wed.tooltip: Enable/disable general store being accessible on Wednesdays.
outside-hours.label: Outside Normal Hours?
outside-hours.tooltip: Enable/disable entering locations that have set access hours.
stranger-home-entry.label: Stranger Home Entry?
stranger-home-entry.tooltip: Enable/disable entering homes that require a certain relationship level to access.
stranger-room-entry.label: Stranger Room Entry?
stranger-room-entry.tooltip: Enable/disable entering rooms that require a certain relationship level to access.
adventure-guild.label: Early Adventurers Guild?
adventure-guild.tooltip: Enable/disable entering the Adventurers Guild before being accepted as a member.
ignore-events.label: Ignore Events?
ignore-events.tooltip: Enable/disable accessing buildings that are locked during events.
